00007 Rboolean isValid_Csparse(SEXP x)
00008 {
00009     /* NB: we do *NOT* check a potential 'x' slot here, at all */
00010     SEXP pslot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym),
00011         islot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym);
00012     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)), j,
00013         nrow = dims[0],
00014         ncol = dims[1],
00015         *xp = INTEGER(pslot),
00016         *xi = INTEGER(islot);
00017 
00018     if (length(pslot) != dims[1] + 1)
00019         return FALSE;
00020     if (xp[0] != 0)
00021         return FALSE;
00022     if (length(islot) < xp[ncol]) /* allow larger slots from over-allocation!*/
00023         return FALSE;
00024     for (j = 0; j < xp[ncol]; j++) {
00025         if (xi[j] < 0 || xi[j] >= nrow)
00026             return FALSE;
00027     }
00028     for (j = 0; j < ncol; j++) {
00029         if (xp[j] > xp[j + 1])
00030             return FALSE;
00031     }
00032     return TRUE;
00033 }

00035 SEXP Csparse_validate(SEXP x) {
00036     return Csparse_validate_(x, FALSE);
00037 }
00038 
00039 SEXP Csparse_validate2(SEXP x, SEXP maybe_modify) {
00040     return Csparse_validate_(x, asLogical(maybe_modify));
00041 }
00042 
00043 SEXP Csparse_validate_(SEXP x, Rboolean maybe_modify)
00044 {
00045     /* NB: we do *NOT* check a potential 'x' slot here, at all */
00046     SEXP pslot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym),
00047         islot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym);
00048     Rboolean sorted, strictly;
00049     int j, k,
00050         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)),
00051         nrow = dims[0],
00052         ncol = dims[1],
00053         *xp = INTEGER(pslot),
00054         *xi = INTEGER(islot);
00055 
00056     if (length(pslot) != dims[1] + 1)
00057         return mkString(_("slot p must have length = ncol(.) + 1"));
00058     if (xp[0] != 0)
00059         return mkString(_("first element of slot p must be zero"));
00060     if (length(islot) < xp[ncol]) /* allow larger slots from over-allocation!*/
00061         return
00062             mkString(_("last element of slot p must match length of slots i and x"));
00063     for (j = 0; j < xp[ncol]; j++) {
00064         if (xi[j] < 0 || xi[j] >= nrow)
00065             return mkString(_("all row indices must be between 0 and nrow-1"));
00066     }
00067     sorted = TRUE; strictly = TRUE;
00068     for (j = 0; j < ncol; j++) {
00069         if (xp[j] > xp[j + 1])
00070             return mkString(_("slot p must be non-decreasing"));
00071         if(sorted) /* only act if >= 2 entries in column j : */
00072             for (k = xp[j] + 1; k < xp[j + 1]; k++) {
00073                 if (xi[k] < xi[k - 1])
00074                     sorted = FALSE;
00075                 else if (xi[k] == xi[k - 1])
00076                     strictly = FALSE;
00077             }
00078     }
00079     if (!sorted) {
00080         if(maybe_modify) {
00081             CHM_SP chx = (CHM_SP) alloca(sizeof(cholmod_sparse));
00082             R_CheckStack();
00083             as_cholmod_sparse(chx, x, FALSE, TRUE);/*-> cholmod_l_sort() ! */
00084             /* as chx = AS_CHM_SP__(x)  but  ^^^^ sorting x in_place !!! */
00085 
00086             /* Now re-check that row indices are *strictly* increasing
00087              * (and not just increasing) within each column : */
00088             for (j = 0; j < ncol; j++) {
00089                 for (k = xp[j] + 1; k < xp[j + 1]; k++)
00090                     if (xi[k] == xi[k - 1])
00091                         return mkString(_("slot i is not *strictly* increasing inside a column (even after cholmod_l_sort)"));
00092             }
00093         } else { /* no modifying sorting : */
00094             return mkString(_("row indices are not sorted within columns"));
00095         }
00096     } else if(!strictly) {  /* sorted, but not strictly */
00097         return mkString(_("slot i is not *strictly* increasing inside a column"));
00098     }
00099     return ScalarLogical(1);
00100 }
00101 
00102 SEXP Rsparse_validate(SEXP x)
00103 {
00104     /* NB: we do *NOT* check a potential 'x' slot here, at all */
00105     SEXP pslot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym),
00106         jslot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_jSym);
00107     Rboolean sorted, strictly;
00108     int i, k,
00109         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)),
00110         nrow = dims[0],
00111         ncol = dims[1],
00112         *xp = INTEGER(pslot),
00113         *xj = INTEGER(jslot);
00114 
00115     if (length(pslot) != dims[0] + 1)
00116         return mkString(_("slot p must have length = nrow(.) + 1"));
00117     if (xp[0] != 0)
00118         return mkString(_("first element of slot p must be zero"));
00119     if (length(jslot) < xp[nrow]) /* allow larger slots from over-allocation!*/
00120         return
00121             mkString(_("last element of slot p must match length of slots j and x"));
00122     for (i = 0; i < length(jslot); i++) {
00123         if (xj[i] < 0 || xj[i] >= ncol)
00124             return mkString(_("all column indices must be between 0 and ncol-1"));
00125     }
00126     sorted = TRUE; strictly = TRUE;
00127     for (i = 0; i < nrow; i++) {
00128         if (xp[i] > xp[i+1])
00129             return mkString(_("slot p must be non-decreasing"));
00130         if(sorted)
00131             for (k = xp[i] + 1; k < xp[i + 1]; k++) {
00132                 if (xj[k] < xj[k - 1])
00133                     sorted = FALSE;
00134                 else if (xj[k] == xj[k - 1])
00135                     strictly = FALSE;
00136             }
00137     }
00138     if (!sorted)
00139         /* cannot easily use cholmod_l_sort(.) ... -> "error out" :*/
00140         return mkString(_("slot j is not increasing inside a column"));
00141     else if(!strictly) /* sorted, but not strictly */
00142         return mkString(_("slot j is not *strictly* increasing inside a column"));
00143 
00144     return ScalarLogical(1);
00145 }

00151 SEXP Csparse_to_dense(SEXP x)
00152 {
00153     CHM_SP chxs = AS_CHM_SP__(x);
00154     /* This loses the symmetry property, since cholmod_dense has none,
00155      * BUT, much worse (FIXME!), it also transforms CHOLMOD_PATTERN ("n") matrices
00156      * to numeric (CHOLMOD_REAL) ones : */
00157     CHM_DN chxd = cholmod_l_sparse_to_dense(chxs, &c);
00158     int Rkind = (chxs->xtype == CHOLMOD_PATTERN)? -1 : Real_kind(x);
00159     R_CheckStack();
00160 
00161     return chm_dense_to_SEXP(chxd, 1, Rkind, GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00162 }

00164 SEXP Csparse_to_nz_pattern(SEXP x, SEXP tri)
00165 {
00166     CHM_SP chxs = AS_CHM_SP__(x);
00167     CHM_SP chxcp = cholmod_l_copy(chxs, chxs->stype, CHOLMOD_PATTERN, &c);
00168     int tr = asLogical(tri);
00169     R_CheckStack();
00170 
00171     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chxcp, 1/*do_free*/,
00172                               tr ? ((*uplo_P(x) == 'U') ? 1 : -1) : 0,
00173                               0, tr ? diag_P(x) : "",
00174                               GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00175 }

00178 {
00179     return chm_dense_to_matrix(cholmod_l_sparse_to_dense(AS_CHM_SP__(x), &c),
00180                                1 /*do_free*/, GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));

00183 SEXP Csparse_to_Tsparse(SEXP x, SEXP tri)
00184 {
00185     CHM_SP chxs = AS_CHM_SP__(x);
00186     CHM_TR chxt = cholmod_l_sparse_to_triplet(chxs, &c);
00187     int tr = asLogical(tri);
00188     int Rkind = (chxs->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00189     R_CheckStack();
00190 
00191     return chm_triplet_to_SEXP(chxt, 1,
00192                                tr ? ((*uplo_P(x) == 'U') ? 1 : -1) : 0,
00193                                Rkind, tr ? diag_P(x) : "",
00194                                GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));

00197 /* this used to be called  sCMatrix_to_gCMatrix(..)   [in ./dsCMatrix.c ]: */
00198 SEXP Csparse_symmetric_to_general(SEXP x)
00199 {
00200     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP__(x), chgx;
00201     int Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00202     R_CheckStack();
00203 
00204     if (!(chx->stype))
00205         error(_("Nonsymmetric matrix in Csparse_symmetric_to_general"));
00206     chgx = cholmod_l_copy(chx, /* stype: */ 0, chx->xtype, &c);
00207     /* xtype: pattern, "real", complex or .. */
00208     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chgx, 1, 0, Rkind, "",
00209                               GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00210 }

00212 SEXP Csparse_general_to_symmetric(SEXP x, SEXP uplo)
00213 {
00214     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP__(x), chgx;
00215     int uploT = (*CHAR(STRING_ELT(uplo,0)) == 'U') ? 1 : -1;
00216     int Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00217     R_CheckStack();
00218 
00219     chgx = cholmod_l_copy(chx, /* stype: */ uploT, chx->xtype, &c);
00220     /* xtype: pattern, "real", complex or .. */
00221     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chgx, 1, 0, Rkind, "",
00222                               GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00223 }

00225 SEXP Csparse_transpose(SEXP x, SEXP tri)
00226 {
00227     /* TODO: lgCMatrix & igC* currently go via double prec. cholmod -
00228      *       since cholmod (& cs) lacks sparse 'int' matrices */
00229     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP__(x);
00230     int Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00231     CHM_SP chxt = cholmod_l_transpose(chx, chx->xtype, &c);
00232     SEXP dn = PROTECT(duplicate(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym))), tmp;
00233     int tr = asLogical(tri);
00234     R_CheckStack();
00235 
00236     tmp = VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0);    /* swap the dimnames */
00237     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0, VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1));
00238     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1, tmp);
00239     UNPROTECT(1);
00240     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chxt, 1, /* SWAP 'uplo' for triangular */
00241                               tr ? ((*uplo_P(x) == 'U') ? -1 : 1) : 0,
00242                               Rkind, tr ? diag_P(x) : "", dn);
00243 }
00244 
00245 SEXP Csparse_Csparse_prod(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00246 {
00247     CHM_SP
00248         cha = AS_CHM_SP(a),
00249         chb = AS_CHM_SP(b),
00250         chc = cholmod_l_ssmult(cha, chb, /*out_stype:*/ 0,
00251                                /* values:= is_numeric (T/F) */ cha->xtype > 0,
00252                                /*out sorted:*/ 1, &c);
00253     const char *cl_a = class_P(a), *cl_b = class_P(b);
00254     char diag[] = {'\0', '\0'};
00255     int uploT = 0;
00256     SEXP dn = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
00257     R_CheckStack();
00258 
00259 #ifdef DEBUG_Matrix_verbose
00260     Rprintf("DBG Csparse_C*_prod(%s, %s)\n", cl_a, cl_b);
00261 #endif
00262 
00263     /* Preserve triangularity and even unit-triangularity if appropriate.
00264      * Note that in that case, the multiplication itself should happen
00265      * faster.  But there's no support for that in CHOLMOD */
00266 
00267     /* UGLY hack -- rather should have (fast!) C-level version of
00268      *       is(a, "triangularMatrix") etc */
00269     if (cl_a[1] == 't' && cl_b[1] == 't')
00270         /* FIXME: fails for "Cholesky","BunchKaufmann"..*/
00271         if(*uplo_P(a) == *uplo_P(b)) { /* both upper, or both lower tri. */
00272             uploT = (*uplo_P(a) == 'U') ? 1 : -1;
00273             if(*diag_P(a) == 'U' && *diag_P(b) == 'U') { /* return UNIT-triag. */
00274                 /* "remove the diagonal entries": */
00275                 chm_diagN2U(chc, uploT, /* do_realloc */ FALSE);
00276                 diag[0]= 'U';
00277             }
00278             else diag[0]= 'N';
00279         }
00280     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0,       /* establish dimnames */
00281                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimNamesSym), 0)));
00282     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1,
00283                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(b, Matrix_DimNamesSym), 1)));
00284     UNPROTECT(1);
00285     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chc, 1, uploT, /*Rkind*/0, diag, dn);
00286 }
00287 
00288 SEXP Csparse_Csparse_crossprod(SEXP a, SEXP b, SEXP trans)
00289 {
00290     int tr = asLogical(trans);
00291     CHM_SP
00292         cha = AS_CHM_SP(a),
00293         chb = AS_CHM_SP(b),
00294         chTr, chc;
00295     const char *cl_a = class_P(a), *cl_b = class_P(b);
00296     char diag[] = {'\0', '\0'};
00297     int uploT = 0;
00298     SEXP dn = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
00299     R_CheckStack();
00300 
00301     chTr = cholmod_l_transpose((tr) ? chb : cha, chb->xtype, &c);
00302     chc = cholmod_l_ssmult((tr) ? cha : chTr, (tr) ? chTr : chb,
00303                          /*out_stype:*/ 0, cha->xtype, /*out sorted:*/ 1, &c);
00304     cholmod_l_free_sparse(&chTr, &c);
00305 
00306     /* Preserve triangularity and unit-triangularity if appropriate;
00307      * see Csparse_Csparse_prod() for comments */
00308     if (cl_a[1] == 't' && cl_b[1] == 't')
00309         if(*uplo_P(a) != *uplo_P(b)) { /* one 'U', the other 'L' */
00310             uploT = (*uplo_P(b) == 'U') ? 1 : -1;
00311             if(*diag_P(a) == 'U' && *diag_P(b) == 'U') { /* return UNIT-triag. */
00312                 chm_diagN2U(chc, uploT, /* do_realloc */ FALSE);
00313                 diag[0]= 'U';
00314             }
00315             else diag[0]= 'N';
00316         }
00317     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0,       /* establish dimnames */
00318                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimNamesSym), (tr) ? 0 : 1)));
00319     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1,
00320                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(b, Matrix_DimNamesSym), (tr) ? 0 : 1)));
00321     UNPROTECT(1);
00322     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chc, 1, uploT, /*Rkind*/0, diag, dn);
00323 }
00324 
00325 SEXP Csparse_dense_prod(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00326 {
00327     CHM_SP cha = AS_CHM_SP(a);
00328     SEXP b_M = PROTECT(mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00329     CHM_DN chb = AS_CHM_DN(b_M);
00330     CHM_DN chc = cholmod_l_allocate_dense(cha->nrow, chb->ncol, cha->nrow,
00331                                         chb->xtype, &c);
00332     SEXP dn = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
00333     double one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
00334     R_CheckStack();
00335 
00336     cholmod_l_sdmult(cha, 0, one, zero, chb, chc, &c);
00337     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0,       /* establish dimnames */
00338                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimNamesSym), 0)));
00339     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1,
00340                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(b_M, Matrix_DimNamesSym), 1)));
00341     UNPROTECT(2);
00342     return chm_dense_to_SEXP(chc, 1, 0, dn);
00343 }

00345 SEXP Csparse_dense_crossprod(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00346 {
00347     CHM_SP cha = AS_CHM_SP(a);
00348     SEXP b_M = PROTECT(mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00349     CHM_DN chb = AS_CHM_DN(b_M);
00350     CHM_DN chc = cholmod_l_allocate_dense(cha->ncol, chb->ncol, cha->ncol,
00351                                         chb->xtype, &c);
00352     SEXP dn = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
00353     double one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
00354     R_CheckStack();
00355 
00356     cholmod_l_sdmult(cha, 1, one, zero, chb, chc, &c);
00357     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0,       /* establish dimnames */
00358                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimNamesSym), 1)));
00359     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1,
00360                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(b_M, Matrix_DimNamesSym), 1)));
00361     UNPROTECT(2);
00362     return chm_dense_to_SEXP(chc, 1, 0, dn);
00363 }
00364 
00365 /* Computes   x'x  or  x x' -- *also* for Tsparse (triplet = TRUE)
00366    see Csparse_Csparse_crossprod above for  x'y and x y' */
00367 SEXP Csparse_crossprod(SEXP x, SEXP trans, SEXP triplet)
00368 {
00369     int trip = asLogical(triplet),
00370         tr   = asLogical(trans); /* gets reversed because _aat is tcrossprod */
00371 #ifdef AS_CHM_DIAGU2N_FIXED_FINALLY
00372     CHM_TR cht = trip ? AS_CHM_TR(x) : (CHM_TR) NULL;
00373 #else /* workaround needed:*/
00374     SEXP xx = PROTECT(Tsparse_diagU2N(x));
00375     CHM_TR cht = trip ? AS_CHM_TR__(xx) : (CHM_TR) NULL;
00376 #endif
00377     CHM_SP chcp, chxt,
00378         chx = (trip ?
00379                cholmod_l_triplet_to_sparse(cht, cht->nnz, &c) :
00380                AS_CHM_SP(x));
00381     SEXP dn = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
00382     R_CheckStack();
00383 
00384     if (!tr) chxt = cholmod_l_transpose(chx, chx->xtype, &c);
00385     chcp = cholmod_l_aat((!tr) ? chxt : chx, (int *) NULL, 0, chx->xtype, &c);
00386     if(!chcp) {
00387         UNPROTECT(1);
00388         error(_("Csparse_crossprod(): error return from cholmod_l_aat()"));
00389     }
00390     cholmod_l_band_inplace(0, chcp->ncol, chcp->xtype, chcp, &c);
00391     chcp->stype = 1;
00392     if (trip) cholmod_l_free_sparse(&chx, &c);
00393     if (!tr) cholmod_l_free_sparse(&chxt, &c);
00394     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0,       /* establish dimnames */
00395                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym),
00396                                         (tr) ? 0 : 1)));
00397     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1, duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0)));
00398 #ifdef AS_CHM_DIAGU2N_FIXED_FINALLY
00399     UNPROTECT(1);
00400 #else
00401     UNPROTECT(2);
00402 #endif
00403     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chcp, 1, 0, 0, "", dn);
00404 }
00405 
00406 SEXP Csparse_drop(SEXP x, SEXP tol)
00407 {
00408     const char *cl = class_P(x);
00409     /* dtCMatrix, etc; [1] = the second character =?= 't' for triangular */
00410     int tr = (cl[1] == 't');
00411     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP__(x);
00412     CHM_SP ans = cholmod_l_copy(chx, chx->stype, chx->xtype, &c);
00413     double dtol = asReal(tol);
00414     int Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00415     R_CheckStack();
00416 
00417     if(!cholmod_l_drop(dtol, ans, &c))
00418         error(_("cholmod_l_drop() failed"));
00419     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(ans, 1,
00420                               tr ? ((*uplo_P(x) == 'U') ? 1 : -1) : 0,
00421                               Rkind, tr ? diag_P(x) : "",
00422                               GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00423 }
00424 
00425 SEXP Csparse_horzcat(SEXP x, SEXP y)
00426 {
00427     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP__(x), chy = AS_CHM_SP__(y);
00428     int Rk_x = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0,
00429         Rk_y = (chy->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(y) : 0,
00430         Rkind = /* logical if both x and y are */ (Rk_x == 1 && Rk_y == 1) ? 1 : 0;
00431     R_CheckStack();
00432 
00433     /* TODO: currently drops dimnames - and we fix at R level */
00434     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(cholmod_l_horzcat(chx, chy, 1, &c),
00435                               1, 0, Rkind, "", R_NilValue);
00436 }
00437 
00438 SEXP Csparse_vertcat(SEXP x, SEXP y)
00439 {
00440     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP__(x), chy = AS_CHM_SP__(y);
00441     int Rk_x = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0,
00442         Rk_y = (chy->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(y) : 0,
00443         Rkind = /* logical if both x and y are */ (Rk_x == 1 && Rk_y == 1) ? 1 : 0;
00444     R_CheckStack();
00445 
00446     /* TODO: currently drops dimnames - and we fix at R level */
00447     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(cholmod_l_vertcat(chx, chy, 1, &c),
00448                               1, 0, Rkind, "", R_NilValue);
00449 }

00451 SEXP Csparse_band(SEXP x, SEXP k1, SEXP k2)
00452 {
00453     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP__(x);
00454     int Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00455     CHM_SP ans = cholmod_l_band(chx, asInteger(k1), asInteger(k2), chx->xtype, &c);
00456     R_CheckStack();
00457 
00458     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(ans, 1, 0, Rkind, "",
00459                               GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00460 }
00461 
00462 SEXP Csparse_diagU2N(SEXP x)
00463 {
00464     const char *cl = class_P(x);
00465     /* dtCMatrix, etc; [1] = the second character =?= 't' for triangular */
00466     if (cl[1] != 't' || *diag_P(x) != 'U') {
00467         /* "trivially fast" when not triangular (<==> no 'diag' slot),
00468            or not *unit* triangular */
00469         return (x);
00470     }
00471     else { /* unit triangular (diag='U'): "fill the diagonal" & diag:= "N" */
00472         CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP__(x);
00473         CHM_SP eye = cholmod_l_speye(chx->nrow, chx->ncol, chx->xtype, &c);
00474         double one[] = {1, 0};
00475         CHM_SP ans = cholmod_l_add(chx, eye, one, one, TRUE, TRUE, &c);
00476         int uploT = (*uplo_P(x) == 'U') ? 1 : -1;
00477         int Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00478 
00479         R_CheckStack();
00480         cholmod_l_free_sparse(&eye, &c);
00481         return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(ans, 1, uploT, Rkind, "N",
00482                                   GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00483     }
00484 }
00485 
00486 SEXP Csparse_diagN2U(SEXP x)
00487 {
00488     const char *cl = class_P(x);
00489     /* dtCMatrix, etc; [1] = the second character =?= 't' for triangular */
00490     if (cl[1] != 't' || *diag_P(x) != 'N') {
00491         /* "trivially fast" when not triangular (<==> no 'diag' slot),
00492            or already *unit* triangular */
00493         return (x);
00494     }
00495     else { /* triangular with diag='N'): now drop the diagonal */
00496         /* duplicate, since chx will be modified: */
00497         CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP__(duplicate(x));
00498         int uploT = (*uplo_P(x) == 'U') ? 1 : -1,
00499             Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00500         R_CheckStack();
00501 
00502         chm_diagN2U(chx, uploT, /* do_realloc */ FALSE);
00503 
00504         return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chx, /*dofree*/ 0/* or 1 ?? */,
00505                                   uploT, Rkind, "U",
00506                                   GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00507     }
00508 }
00509 
00519 SEXP Csparse_submatrix(SEXP x, SEXP i, SEXP j)
00520 {
00521     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP(x); /* << does diagU2N() when needed */
00522     int rsize = (isNull(i)) ? -1 : LENGTH(i),
00523         csize = (isNull(j)) ? -1 : LENGTH(j);
00524     int Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00525     R_CheckStack();
00526 
00527     if (rsize >= 0 && !isInteger(i))
00528         error(_("Index i must be NULL or integer"));
00529     if (csize >= 0 && !isInteger(j))
00530         error(_("Index j must be NULL or integer"));
00531 
00532     if (chx->stype) /* symmetricMatrix */
00533         /* for now, cholmod_submatrix() only accepts "generalMatrix" */
00534         chx = cholmod_l_copy(chx, /* stype: */ 0, chx->xtype, &c);
00535 
00536     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(cholmod_l_submatrix(chx,
00537                                 (rsize < 0) ? NULL : INTEGER(i), rsize,
00538                                 (csize < 0) ? NULL : INTEGER(j), csize,
00539                                                   TRUE, TRUE, &c),
00540                               1, 0, Rkind, "",
00541                               /* FIXME: drops dimnames */ R_NilValue);
00542 }
00543 
00544 SEXP Csparse_MatrixMarket(SEXP x, SEXP fname)
00545 {
00546     FILE *f = fopen(CHAR(asChar(fname)), "w");
00547 
00548     if (!f)
00549         error(_("failure to open file \"%s\" for writing"),
00550               CHAR(asChar(fname)));
00551     if (!cholmod_l_write_sparse(f, AS_CHM_SP(x),
00552                               (CHM_SP)NULL, (char*) NULL, &c))
00553         error(_("cholmod_l_write_sparse returned error code"));
00554     fclose(f);
00555     return R_NilValue;
00556 }
00557 
00558 
00571 SEXP diag_tC_ptr(int n, int *x_p, double *x_x, int *perm, SEXP resultKind)
00572 /*                                ^^^^^^ FIXME[Generalize] to int / ... */
00573 {
00574     const char* res_ch = CHAR(STRING_ELT(resultKind,0));
00575     enum diag_kind { diag, diag_backpermuted, trace, prod, sum_log
00576     } res_kind = ((!strcmp(res_ch, "trace")) ? trace :
00577                   ((!strcmp(res_ch, "sumLog")) ? sum_log :
00578                    ((!strcmp(res_ch, "prod")) ? prod :
00579                     ((!strcmp(res_ch, "diag")) ? diag :
00580                      ((!strcmp(res_ch, "diagBack")) ? diag_backpermuted :
00581                       -1)))));
00582     int i, n_x, i_from = 0;
00583     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP,
00584 /*                                 ^^^^  FIXME[Generalize] */
00585                                    (res_kind == diag ||
00586                                     res_kind == diag_backpermuted) ? n : 1));
00587     double *v = REAL(ans);
00588 /*  ^^^^^^      ^^^^  FIXME[Generalize] */
00589 
00590 #define for_DIAG(v_ASSIGN)                                              \
00591     for(i = 0; i < n; i++, i_from += n_x) {                             \
00592         /* looking at i-th column */                                    \
00593         n_x = x_p[i+1] - x_p[i];/* #{entries} in this column */ \
00594         v_ASSIGN;                                                       \
00595     }
00596 
00597     /* NOTA BENE: we assume  -- uplo = "L" i.e. lower triangular matrix
00598      *            for uplo = "U" (makes sense with a "dtCMatrix" !),
00599      *            should use  x_x[i_from + (nx - 1)] instead of x_x[i_from],
00600      *            where nx = (x_p[i+1] - x_p[i])
00601      */
00602 
00603     switch(res_kind) {
00604     case trace:
00605         v[0] = 0.;
00606         for_DIAG(v[0] += x_x[i_from]);
00607         break;
00608 
00609     case sum_log:
00610         v[0] = 0.;
00611         for_DIAG(v[0] += log(x_x[i_from]));
00612         break;
00613 
00614     case prod:
00615         v[0] = 1.;
00616         for_DIAG(v[0] *= x_x[i_from]);
00617         break;
00618 
00619     case diag:
00620         for_DIAG(v[i] = x_x[i_from]);
00621         break;
00622 
00623     case diag_backpermuted:
00624         for_DIAG(v[i] = x_x[i_from]);
00625 
00626         warning(_("resultKind = 'diagBack' (back-permuted) is experimental"));
00627         /* now back_permute : */
00628         for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00629             double tmp = v[i]; v[i] = v[perm[i]]; v[perm[i]] = tmp;
00630             /*^^^^ FIXME[Generalize] */
00631         }
00632         break;
00633 
00634     default: /* -1 from above */
00635         error(_("diag_tC(): invalid 'resultKind'"));
00636         /* Wall: */ ans = R_NilValue; v = REAL(ans);
00637     }
00638 
00639     UNPROTECT(1);
00640     return ans;
00641 }
00642 
00655 SEXP diag_tC(SEXP pslot, SEXP xslot, SEXP perm_slot, SEXP resultKind)
00656 {
00657     int n = length(pslot) - 1, /* n = ncol(.) = nrow(.) */
00658         *x_p  = INTEGER(pslot),
00659         *perm = INTEGER(perm_slot);
00660     double *x_x = REAL(xslot);
00661 /*  ^^^^^^        ^^^^ FIXME[Generalize] to INTEGER(.) / LOGICAL(.) / ... xslot !*/
00662 
00663     return diag_tC_ptr(n, x_p, x_x, perm, resultKind);
00664 }
00665 
00684 SEXP create_Csparse(char* cls, int* i, int* j, int* p, int np,
00685                     void* x, int nnz, int* dims, SEXP dimnames,
00686                     int index1)
00687 {
00688     SEXP ans;
00689     int *ij = (int*)NULL, *tri, *trj,
00690         mi, mj, mp, nrow = -1, ncol = -1;
00691     int xtype = -1;             /* -Wall */
00692     CHM_TR T;
00693     CHM_SP A;
00694 
00695     if (np < 0 || nnz < 0)
00696         error(_("negative vector lengths not allowed: np = %d, nnz = %d"),
00697               np, nnz);
00698     if (1 != ((mi = (i == (int*)NULL)) +
00699               (mj = (j == (int*)NULL)) +
00700               (mp = (p == (int*)NULL))))
00701         error(_("exactly 1 of 'i', 'j' or 'p' must be NULL"));
00702     if (mp) {
00703         if (np) error(_("np = %d, must be zero when p is NULL"), np);
00704     } else {
00705         if (np) {               /* Expand p to form i or j */
00706             if (!(p[0])) error(_("p[0] = %d, should be zero"), p[0]);
00707             for (int ii = 0; ii < np; ii++)
00708                 if (p[ii] > p[ii + 1])
00709                     error(_("p must be non-decreasing"));
00710             if (p[np] != nnz)
00711                 error("p[np] = %d != nnz = %d", p[np], nnz);
00712             ij = Calloc(nnz, int);
00713             if (mi) {
00714                 i = ij;
00715                 nrow = np;
00716             } else {
00717                 j = ij;
00718                 ncol = np;
00719             }
00720                                 /* Expand p to 0-based indices */
00721             for (int ii = 0; ii < np; ii++)
00722                 for (int jj = p[ii]; jj < p[ii + 1]; jj++) ij[jj] = ii;
00723         } else {
00724             if (nnz)
00725                 error(_("Inconsistent dimensions: np = 0 and nnz = %d"),
00726                       nnz);
00727         }
00728     }
00729                                 /* calculate nrow and ncol */
00730     if (nrow < 0) {
00731         for (int ii = 0; ii < nnz; ii++) {
00732             int i1 = i[ii] + (index1 ? 0 : 1); /* 1-based index */
00733             if (i1 < 1) error(_("invalid row index at position %d"), ii);
00734             if (i1 > nrow) nrow = i1;
00735         }
00736     }
00737     if (ncol < 0) {
00738         for (int jj = 0; jj < nnz; jj++) {
00739             int j1 = j[jj] + (index1 ? 0 : 1);
00740             if (j1 < 1) error(_("invalid column index at position %d"), jj);
00741             if (j1 > ncol) ncol = j1;
00742         }
00743     }
00744     if (dims != (int*)NULL) {
00745         if (dims[0] > nrow) nrow = dims[0];
00746         if (dims[1] > ncol) ncol = dims[1];
00747     }
00748                                 /* check the class name */
00749     if (strlen(cls) != 8)
00750         error(_("strlen of cls argument = %d, should be 8"), strlen(cls));
00751     if (!strcmp(cls + 2, "CMatrix"))
00752         error(_("cls = \"%s\" does not end in \"CMatrix\""), cls);
00753     switch(cls[0]) {
00754     case 'd':
00755     case 'l':
00756            xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;
00757            break;
00758     case 'n':
00759            xtype = CHOLMOD_PATTERN;
00760            break;
00761     default:
00762            error(_("cls = \"%s\" must begin with 'd', 'l' or 'n'"), cls);
00763     }
00764     if (cls[1] != 'g')
00765         error(_("Only 'g'eneral sparse matrix types allowed"));
00766                                 /* allocate and populate the triplet */
00767     T = cholmod_l_allocate_triplet((size_t)nrow, (size_t)ncol, (size_t)nnz, 0,
00768                                     xtype, &c);
00769     T->x = x;
00770     tri = (int*)T->i;
00771     trj = (int*)T->j;
00772     for (int ii = 0; ii < nnz; ii++) {
00773         tri[ii] = i[ii] - ((!mi && index1) ? 1 : 0);
00774         trj[ii] = j[ii] - ((!mj && index1) ? 1 : 0);
00775     }
00776                                 /* create the cholmod_sparse structure */
00777     A = cholmod_l_triplet_to_sparse(T, nnz, &c);
00778     cholmod_l_free_triplet(&T, &c);
00779                                 /* copy the information to the SEXP */
00780     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(cls)));
00781 /* FIXME: This has been copied from chm_sparse_to_SEXP in chm_common.c */
00782                                 /* allocate and copy common slots */
00783     nnz = cholmod_l_nnz(A, &c);
00784     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00785     dims[0] = A->nrow; dims[1] = A->ncol;
00786     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_pSym, INTSXP, A->ncol + 1)), (int*)A->p, A->ncol + 1);
00787     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP, nnz)), (int*)A->i, nnz);
00788     switch(cls[1]) {
00789     case 'd':
00790         Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, nnz)), (double*)A->x, nnz);
00791         break;
00792     case 'l':
00793         error(_("code not yet written for cls = \"lgCMatrix\""));
00794     }
00795     cholmod_l_free_sparse(&A, &c);
00796     UNPROTECT(1);
00797     return ans;
00798 }
Generated on Thu Aug 5 22:19:05 2010 for Matrix by  1.6.3
